abstracts.cdata!:
The Sixth Imports Program Project will
            provide foreign exchange for the import of industrial
            components, chemicals, raw materials and spare parts to
            enable selected high priority industries to maintain their
            production. In connection with this credit action programs
            have been agreed on to consolidate and to expand the scope
            of efforts started under previous imports credits in
            improving the efficiency and financial viability of the jute
            and cotton texile industries.
